main.name: Mohtasim Hadi Rafi
main.bio: BSc Engg in Softare Engineering student at Islamic University of Technology. Have knowledge in JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, NodeJS. Ability to implement a full SDLC, Design Patterns. Seeking an opportunity in the field of Software Engineering.

education.description: Right now I am on my 6th semester. Two more semesters to go before I graduate.
Passed with a GPA-5 and talentpool scholarship.

work.title: Mathematics Instructor
work.description: This is a secondary school in Bhaktapur, Nepal. I worked as an instructor of Mathematics for 9th and 10th grade students. I did it under an internship program of an organization named AIESEC.

achievements.name: National Mobile Application Development Awareness & Capacity Building Program
achievements.info: Successfully completed a five day long training course on mobile application development organized by Ministry of Information & Communication Technology

coCurricular.name: Regional National High School Programming Contest - 2016
i-gen - 2015
coCurricular.description: Winner at School and District Level
